MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Brandon Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.19pm. Our engineers have arrived at Warriston Crescent and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.14pm on Tuesday 29th December 2020
